title: The Queen Mary J. Blige Tells All!
itunes:title: The Queen Mary J. Blige Tells All!
description:
FRI-03/31 It was a special Breakfast Club today because the Queen Mary J. Blige came thru to discuss her new album and clear up some of news and rumors involving her divorce from Kendu Isaacs. Mary gives you the 411 on the manipulation, disrespect and her breaking point when she filed for divorce. She also responds to comments made by Faith Evans when she was on the Breakfast Club a few weeks ago. Also, Young Dolph stopped by and explained what happened the night his truck was shot up, his beef with Yo Gotti, and the priceless advice he received from Gucci Mane. The Donkey of the day was awarded to Former National Security Advisor "I'm Tellin"...you have to listen to this one!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
